meanings.definition: The transportation of goods or personnel by sea.
meanings.sent1: The sealift brought supplies to the island.
meanings.sent2: The military used a sealift to move troops across the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The sealift of snacks for the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a sealift in the stormy sea of his day.
meanings.sent5: The sealift of colorful fish in the aquarium was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A fleet of ships used for transporting goods or personnel by sea.
meanings.sent1: The sealift departed from the harbor at dawn.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in a new sealift for their overseas operations.
meanings.sent3: The sealift of toy boats in the bathtub was a fun sight.
meanings.sent4: The sealift of clouds in the sky painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The sealift of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
